name: Unanswered - Sprint #1 Playtest
description:
The first iteration of my 2D atmospheric puzzle platformer/adventure game- largely inspired by great games like LIMBO and INSIDE. 

Currently there is just one small tutorial-ish level to play through, but hopefully it should give you a decent feel for my goals with the game :)

Here is the feedback form, would really appreciate feedback once you've given it a  go!! https://forms.gle/Kx4Ykvvp12baYUSn6

Hope you enjoy :D

by Ethan Davidson
